channel.title: Bank script help
channel.description:
How to use the FindBank procedure i only get this error when i try the code like this : FindBank(TheBank: string): Boolean; this is the error given: Line 25: [Error] (14338:14): Unknown identifier 'TheBank' in script C:\Documents and Settings\Meanz\Skrivebord\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\MeanzPowerCutter.scar
any1 help :P

item.title: Bank script help
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

You need to replace the TheBank text with the name of the bank. I dont know the exact syntax of it, but it should be something like this: findbank(‘veb’), so to find the bank you would say:
repeat findbank(‘veb’) until bankscreen.

Read full topic
